title: A multi‐center controlled trial of growth hormone treatment in children with cystic fibrosis
abstract: We evaluated safety and efficacy of recombinant human growth hormone (rhGH) for improving growth, lean body mass (LBM), pulmonary function, and exercise tolerance in children with cystic fibrosis (CF) and growth restriction.

title: Nutrition and Growth in Chronic Diseases.
explanation: Although this paper discusses nutrition and growth in chronic diseases, including cystic fibrosis, it does not specifically address growth hormone treatment or build upon the findings of the source paper. However, it does share some common themes and context, so it can be considered partially relevant.
